segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children near the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is definitely up to some mischief, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, wobbly stool, reaching precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over backward at any moment; that makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far to reach the 'COOKIE JAR' in the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, waiting so patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, eagerly anticipating a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's got one! I saw him pull it out!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so incredibly focused on their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are really splayed out, making it look very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how close he is to falling right onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Both of them seem completely unaware of the physical danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite an elaborate and risky plan just for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really want those treats to take such a chance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't tumble down and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
